line.comment: * Wait to be sure that the game knows where we are and that the galaxy is initialized.
* Should we fill created ships with fighters?
* If filling with fighters, should we include m4/m5
* Should filled fighters protect (1) or attack nearest (2)
* Number of each type of ship to make (in addition to fighter.fill)

sval.val: Wait to be sure that the game knows where we are and that the galaxy is initialized.
Should we fill created ships with fighters?
If filling with fighters, should we include m4/m5
Should filled fighters protect (1) or attack nearest (2)
Number of each type of ship to make (in addition to fighter.fill)
